name: Dennis the Menace (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.8.0 (alpha) Details Title Dennis the Menace Model No. 78-532 Series Handheld Manufacturer Tiger Electronics Release Date 1993 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Dennis the Menace is back in another crazy adventure in this 1993 LCD video game from Tiger Electronics, and only you can get him out of trouble! With his faithful dog Ruff and his trusty slingshot, steer Dennis as he rides his bike through the neighborhood and in and out of mischief!

Gameplay

You play as Dennis the Menace as he rides his bike through the neighborhood trying to avoid obstacles in 4 action-filled stages. In each stage you'll need to dodge all the obstacles until a timer appears and counts down from 30! Within the time limit, you must complete the special challenge for each stage:

  • Stage 1 - Shoot an aspirin down Mr. Wilson's throat.
  • Stage 2 - Shoot a rock into a hole in the tree.
  • Stage 3 - Shoot a seed into Mr. Wilson's flower pot.
  • Stage 4 - Capture Switchblade Sam by taping, handcuffing and roping him.

You get 6 chances in each stage. You lose a chance whenever you can't avoid an obstacle. If you lose all your chances, you also lose the game!

Tips
  • As Dennis rides through each stage his loyal dog, Ruff, is always chasing him. To avoid Ruff catching up to Dennis, either move to the other side of the road, or speed up to leave him behind.
  • In stage 3 watch out for good old Mr. Wilson who appears occasionally from his garden and tries to grab Dennis.
Controls Keyboard Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Accelerate W or Up Arrow Brake S or Down Arrow Pick X+C or J+K (left+right) Slingshot Z+V or H+L (left+right) Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel
Resources Audio Bob Zed ( youtube.com ) Instructions Replacement Docs ( replacementdocs.com ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
